scripts.dev:prisma: cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/prisma generate --watch
scripts.build:server: npm run migrate:up && npm run build:frourio && cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:frourio: cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/prisma generate && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/frourio
scripts.start:server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:types && tsc --noEmit && tsc --noEmit -p server
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:save && npm run migrate:up
scripts.migrate:save: cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate save --create-db --experimental
scripts.migrate:up: cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate up --create-db --experimental
scripts.migrate:down: cd server && cross-env DUMMY_ENV=forWin node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate down --experimental
